    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Los poliedros regulares y la esfera</string>
            <string language="en">Regular polyhedra and the sphere</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Regelmäßige Polyeder und der Bereich</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Polyèdres réguliers et la sphère</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Polyhedra regulares e a esfera</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Poliedri normali e la sfera</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κανονικά polyhedra και η σφαίρα</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones los conceptos relacionados con los poliedros regulares y la esfera. Se muestra mediante las simulaciones la imposibilidad de que pueda haber más de cinco poliedros regulares. También se estudian fórmulas relacionadas con la esfera.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to explain concepts related to regular polyhedra and the sphere. The simulations show why it is impossible to construct polyhedra other than the five known regular polyhedra. The unit also studies formulae related to the sphere.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">aristas</string>
            <string language="en">sides</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">vértices</string>
            <string language="en">vertices</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">caras</string>
            <string language="en">faces</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">esfera</string>
            <string language="en">sphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">geometría</string>
            <string language="en">geometry</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">ángulos</string>
            <string language="en">angles</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">regulares</string>
            <string language="en">regular</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">tridimensional</string>
            <string language="en">three-dimensional</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">poliedros</string>
            <string language="en">polyhedra</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit, welche 
Gebrauchsimulationen, Konzepte zu erklären auf regelmäßigen 
Polyedern und dem Bereich in Verbindung stand. Die Simulationen 
zeigen, warum es unmöglich ist, Polyeder anders als die fünf 
bekannten regelmäßigen Polyeder zu konstruieren. Die 
Maßeinheit studiert auch die Formeln, die auf dem Bereich in 
Verbindung gestanden werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles simulations 
d'utilisations expliquer des concepts a associées aux polyèdres 
réguliers et à la sphère. Les simulations montrent pourquoi 
il est impossible de construire des polyèdres autres que les cinq 
polyèdres réguliers connus. L'unité étudie également des 
formules liées à la sphère.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que simulações dos usos 
explicar conceitos relacionou aos polyhedra regulares e à esfera. 
As simulações mostram porque é impossível construir 
polyhedra à excepção dos cinco polyhedra regulares sabidos. A
unidade estuda também as fórmulas relacionadas à esfera.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali simulazioni di usi 
spiegare i concetti ha collegato ai poliedri normali ed alla sfera. 
Le simulazioni mostrano perchè è impossible da costruire i 
poliedri tranne i cinque poliedri normali conosciuti. L'unità 
egualmente studia le formule relative alla sfera.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">η μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις 
προσομοιώσεις για να εξηγήσει τις έννοιες αφορούσε κανονικά 
polyhedra και τη σφαίρα. Οι προσομοιώσεις εμφανίζουν 
γιατί είναι αδύνατο να κατασκευαστούν polyhedra εκτός από 
πέντε γνωστά κανονικά polyhedra. Η μονάδα μελετά επίσης
τους τύπους σχετικούς με τη σφαίρα.</string>
          </description>
